steps.step: Beat cream cheese, sugar, and 1 tablespoon milk in a large bowl until smooth. Gently stir in 1/2 of the whipped topping. Spread on bottom of crust.
Pour 2 cups cool milk into large bowl. Add pudding mixes. Beat with wire wisk 2 minutes. (Mixture will be thick) Pour over cream cheese layer.
Refrigerate 4 hours or until set. Just before serving, spread remaining whipped topping over pudding layer. Garnish with shaved chocolate.
